general.name: Muhammad Shabri Rabbani
general.headline: Specializing in building responsive and interactive user interfaces with modern technologies.
about: I am a computer science graduate from Syiah Kuala University with a strong passion for technology and software development, including frontend, backend, and full-stack development. I possess a solid programming background, particularly in Javascript (React, Next.js, Vue, Node.js), Typescript, Java (Spring), and PHP (Laravel). I have hands-on experience with all these frameworks.

experiences.title: Software Engineer
experiences.description: Collaborating with the team to building responsive user interfaces with Next.ts and Ant Design, integrating data with GraphQL, and optimizing performance for seamless user experiences

experiences.title: Software Engineer Intern
experiences.description: Design and develop Stehosoul.id website using React.js and Tailwind CSS. Building admin dashboard for managing the Bahasakita.id for internal purposes using React.js.

experiences.title: Software Engineer Intern
experiences.description: Contributed to the development of an advanced E-Arsip platform, which increased employee accessibility and reduced operational workflow inefficiencies

education.subject: University of Syiah Kuala
education.description: Relevant coursework: Software Engineer, Web Design,UI/UX, Algorithm, Algorithm and Data Structure, Computer Architecture, Data Science

projects.name: Movieratt
projects.framework: React.Js - Tailwind CSS - TMDB API - Axios - Redux
projects.description: A website displaying the latest movie ratings, reviews, and audience scores to help users find trending films.

projects.name: Weather App
projects.framework: React.Js - Tailwind CSS - OpenWeatherMap - Axios - Redux
projects.description: A website that provides real-time weather updates, forecasts, and city-specific conditions.

projects.name: Eduwave
projects.framework: React.Js - Tailwind CSS - Spring Boot - PostgreSQL - Redux - Axios
projects.description: A website for seamless digital school fee payments, offering secure transactions and easy tracking for students and parents.

projects.name: Sistem Alumni USK
projects.framework: Laravel - MySQL - PHP - HTML - CSS - Bootstrap
projects.description: A website for managing alumni systems for University of Syiah Kuala, providing features for data management, networking, and event coordination.

projects.name: E-Shipping
projects.framework: Laravel - MySQL - PHP - HTML - CSS - Bootstrap
projects.description: A website for efficient e-shipping, offering real-time tracking, and streamlined delivery management.
